remarks: The set of injected scalars is also interpretable as the span of the identity.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2015.)
statement:
rnascl.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` W ) $.
rnascl.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` W ) $.
rnascl.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
rnascl $p |- ( W e. AssAlg -> ran A = ( N ` { .1. } ) ) $.
